name: World's Easiest Game
description:
A World's Hardest Game fangame.

Though the game name is World's Easiest Game, this game is hard, believe me.

Features :

  • Engine rewriten in GML.
  • Custom physics.
  • 3 hand made levels (will add more with time).

Donations is always appreciated, it would give me more time to work on the game and add new stuff, and maybe upload it as a web game once it's done ^^

Credits :

  • Soundtrack from Jack Renaud's Chiptune RPG Music Pack.
  • Font by Kenney.nl.
